contexts.context: ...many assume they accept only candidates of the highest intelligence and <mark>willpower</mark>.
Not true. Telvanni accept candidates of modest intelligence and <mark>willpower</mark>.
...true that advancement in Telvanni ranks depends on high intelligence and <mark>willpower</mark>, and that candidates proficient in the arts of magic --...
...the Tribunal must have the Personality to lead others and the <mark>Willpower</mark> to resist the world's temptations. When violence is needful,...
